hero.title: Abdeen Law Firm and Legal Consultancy
hero.description: Abdeen Law Firm is a Syrian law firm advising venture capital funds, private equity firms, multinational companies, and strategic investors on market entry, corporate structuring, regulatory compliance, and dispute resolution in Syria.
